{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3685626,"name":"Nicholas Armstrong","username":"narmstro","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/5e9695/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-07-20T21:15:34.945Z","cooked":"

For those of us who dabble in programming in C++. I was able to finally get a robot project to somewhat work in CLion.

I made a video of my progress.
I’m not going to lie. I get a bit rambly near the end and the gradle component is something I just tried in the video at the end.
Enjoy. link
